attributes.action: DEATH SENTENCE FOR MURDERERS, RAPISTS, SEX OFFENDERS, CHILD ABUSERS
attributes.additional_details: Prisons are over crowded so this solution will free up space and more so offenders cannot re offend if they aren't walking the streets!!
attributes.background: As a country, as one big massive community need to keep everyone safe. Protect our children from being harmed and abused. Families need justice. The death penalty SHOULD be a non argument sentence in which all Sex Offenders, murderers, rapists, molesters receive.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions, which call for similar action:

Reinstate capital punishment for those convicted of sexually abusing of a child
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/739802

Reinstate capital punishment for rape or for serious sexual assault
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/740433

Reintroduce the death penalty for murder
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/748625
